vajrO#&siq vArtra#GnaqstvayAq yaM ~MvRuqtraM ~Mva#ddhyAcCatruqbAdha#nAH sthapAqta mA$ praqtya~jca#M pAqta mA# tiqrya~jca#maqnva~jca#M mA pAta diqgByO mA# pAtaq viSvA$ByO mA nAqShTrABya#H pAtaq hira#NyavarNA-vuqShasA$M ~MvirOqkE&ya#H sthUNAq-vudi#tauq sUryaqsyA&& rO#hataM ~MvaruNa mitraq gartaqM tata#ScakShAthAqmadi#tiqM diti#M ca || 23
(SiSuq-rindraqsyai-ka#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A12)
